column2: ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. WE HAVE SECURED OBJECTIVE ONE. OVER.

THIS IS BRAVO. COPY THAT. ON OUR WAY, STAY PUT AND SECURE THE AREA. OVER.
